entry.title: 📢 @EthereumDenver LEGO! Excited to partner with @POKTnetwork and friends to bring builders together again in Denver next month! Come for good vibes...
entry.summary:
📢 @EthereumDenver LEGO! Excited to partner with @POKTnetwork and friends to bring builders together again in Denver next month! Come for good vibes and tech alpha. Leave with friends and bespoke web3 themed Lego creations. What's not to love. Who's in? ⬇️
Pocket Network: POKT Network is excited to cohost a Builder's Lego Mixer in Denver on the 27th of Feb, 4-9pm! 🍻 Take time out from hacking and hustling to enjoy an afternoon of fireside chats with battle-tested builders and leading d/infra projects, chill out with other devs, and show off your…
